data.name: Rue
data.detailed_description:
State: The game is currently in Alpha and under active development. Some polish and features are missing, but feel free to enjoy the game until those are done.

A card game where all the players are sitting around a table. A rose appears on the table that moves around.

The aim of the game is for each player to have the rose in front of them at the end of the round. Each player can use cards that influence the rose’s movement.
data.about_the_game:
State: The game is currently in Alpha and under active development. Some polish and features are missing, but feel free to enjoy the game until those are done.

data.short_description: A puzzle card game where all the players are sitting around a table. A rose appears on the table that moves around. The aim of the game is for each player to have the rose in front of them at the end of the round. Each player can use cards that influence the rose’s movement.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD a4-9125 RADEON R3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeom(TM) R3 Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.recommended:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.2.0 LTS
  • Processor: AMD a4-9125 RADEON R3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeom(TM) R3 Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Also tested on Arch Linux

Recommended:
